alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Carroll; Clinton; Daviess; Livingston; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Daviess, east central Clinton, northern Ray, northwestern Carroll, Caldwell and southwestern Livingston Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1014 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Polo, or 10 miles northeast of Lawson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lawson, Hamilton, Braymer, Polo, Breckenridge, Kingston, Cowgill, Excelsior Estates, Kidder, Ludlow, Mooresville, Lock Springs, Elmira, Knoxville and Dawn. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 50 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Carroll; Clinton; Daviess; Livingston; Ray
